titles: The last speech of Sir Godfrey McCullough of Myretoun, knight and baronet, who was beheaded at the cross of Edinburgh, the twenty sixth day of March, 1697.
author: McCullough, Godfrey, Sir.
publisher: Printed by John Reid, and are to be sold at his printing house in Bells Wynd,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
